entries.meaning: A list of tasks to be completed, names to be consulted, conditions to be verified and similar.

examples: a checklist of the plants of the Guiana Shield

verbs.description: checklist (third-person singular simple present checklists, present participle checklisting, simple past and past participle checklisted)

examples: It was like he was checklisting the steps of brushing your teeth. Everyone knows how to brush your teeth—you do it automatically—so what good would a checklist do?
